thread.title: Eddie Bond
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Eddie Bond

author: Eddie Bond
title: Eddie Bond
text: I had a great experience there. Mario Rawlins my salesperson at the Warren Mi location made the purchase easy. I told him my budget and worked with me. He wasn't pushy or trying to sell me something I didn't need. Would recommend him to anyone
